EmailTemplate.name: HH $300 reminder 14-day
EmailTemplate.subject: First payment to confirm your Live Different Build
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.TReceipt_Contact_FirstN__c} Thanks for your interest in coming on a Live Different Build, we'd love to have you join us this year!
We noticed that you filled out the online registration for for one of our trips, but we have not yet received your initial $300, which is required to confirm your registration. Was that because you had some questions about the trip? We'd love to help you out and answer any and all of your questions, (seriously...ask as many as you'd like, we're used to it!), so please send us an email or give us a call!
If you don't have any questions at this point, but you're still planning to attend the trip you registered for, please send your intial $300 in as soon as possible so that we can reserve your spot!
Here is the online donation form you can use to make your payment:
https://www.tfaforms.com/221219?tfa_id={!Opportunity.Id}&tfa_NameofHeroHolida={!Opportunity.TReceipt_Contact_FirstN__c}%20{!Opportunity.TReceipt_Contact_LastN__c}
Thanks,
